track.Title: 8K Sample Video | Alpha 1 | Sony | α
track.Description: The new image sensor and BIONZ XR engine in the Alpha1 deliver 8K 30p movie recording capability for extraordinary realism. Four times the resolution of 4K  with full Real-time Tracking and Real-time Eye AF functionality.  /  / #SonyAlpha #a1 / Subscribe: http://bit.ly/SonyCameraChannel /  / About Sony: / At Sony, our mission is to be a company that inspires and fulfills your curiosity. Our unlimited passion for technology, content and services, and relentless pursuit of innovation, drives us to deliver ground-breaking new excitement and entertainment in ways that only Sony can, creating unique new cultures and experiences. Everything we do is to move you emotionally. /  / Connect with Sony’s Digital Imaging Online. / Visit the Sony’s Digital Imaging WEBSITE: http://www.sony.net/di/ilc/ /  / Sony Camera Channel / https://www.youtube.com/c/imagingbysony
